pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Medicated Gel For Acne 25g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Medicated Gel For Acne is an invisible treatment for pimples and acne.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Medicated Gel For Acne is a concentrated treatment for acne prone and problem skin penetrates into the skin and helps to dry out acne and pimples. Ideal for whiteheads, blackheads, pimples and acne.

Product Claims: Tea Tree Medicated Gel for Acne has won Best Spot/Pimple Treatment in the 2018 Beautyheaven Best in Beauty Awards. We are also thrilled to announce that the product has achieved a 4/5 star rating on BeautyHeaven.com.au.

Boxed Contents: Tube

Size: 25g

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

Dermatologically Tested?: Yes

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Invisible treatment for pimples and acne
• Contains 100% pure Australian Tea Tree Oil, a natural antibacterial ingredient to help control acne. Tea Tree Oil has demonstrated to be as effective as Benzoyl Peroxide in the treatment of mild to moderate acne, with fewer side effects.
• Penetrates deep into the skin
• Concentrated formula to dry out pimples and acne
• Free from Benzoyl peroxide

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions for use. If symptoms persist talk to your healthcare professional.

CAUTION

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use, if sensitivity occurs discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not use on broken skin. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if foil seal at mouth of tube is broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Melaleuca Oil 200mg/g.

Contains: Alcohol.

Directions

Cleanse skin thoroughly. Gently apply a small amount to affected areas morning and night.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Blow 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
